info.title: PLANKA API
info.description: API documentation for PLANKA - Real-Time Collaborative Kanban Board Application

id.description: Unique identifier for the action

boardId.description: ID of the board where the action occurred

cardId.description: ID of the card where the action occurred

userId.description: ID of the user who performed the action

updatedAt.description: When the action was last updated

id.description: Unique identifier for the attachment

cardId.description: ID of the card the attachment belongs to

creatorUserId.description: ID of the user who created the attachment

updatedAt.description: When the attachment was last updated

id.description: Unique identifier for the background image

projectId.description: ID of the project the background image belongs to

size.description: File size of the background image in bytes

url.description: URL to access the full-size background image

thumbnailUrls.description: URLs for different thumbnail sizes of the background image

createdAt.description: When the background image was created

updatedAt.description: When the background image was last updated

id.description: Unique identifier for the base custom field group

projectId.description: ID of the project the base custom field group belongs to

name.description: Name/title of the base custom field group

createdAt.description: When the base custom field group was created

updatedAt.description: When the base custom field group was last updated

id.description: Unique identifier for the board

projectId.description: ID of the project the board belongs to

position.description: Position of the board within the project

defaultCardType.description: Default card type for new cards

limitCardTypesToDefaultOne.description: Whether to limit card types to default one

alwaysDisplayCardCreator.description: Whether to always display the card creator

expandTaskListsByDefault.description: Whether to expand task lists by default

updatedAt.description: When the board was last updated

id.description: Unique identifier for the board membership

projectId.description: ID of the project the board membership belongs to (denormalized)

boardId.description: ID of the board the membership is associated with

userId.description: ID of the user who is a member of the board

role.description: Role of the user in the board

canComment.description: Whether the user can comment on cards (applies only to viewers)

createdAt.description: When the board membership was created

updatedAt.description: When the board membership was last updated

id.description: Unique identifier for the board release

boardId.description: ID of the board this release belongs to

target.example: Implement complete signup flow with email verification and password reset

reviewResult.description: Review result or outcome description for the release
reviewResult.example: All features tested and approved. Minor UI improvements suggested for next release.

startDate.description: Start date for the release work

endDate.description: Target end date for the release

releasedAt.description: Actual date when the release was published

updatedAt.description: When the release was last updated

id.description: Unique identifier for the board-team association

role.description: Role of the team in the board

canComment.description: Whether the team can comment on cards (applies only to viewers)

updatedAt.description: When the association was last updated

id.description: Unique identifier for the board template

description.example: Template for agile sprint planning with predefined lists

isListsLocked.description: Whether lists can be modified by users

createdByUserId.description: ID of the admin user who created the template

updatedAt.description: When the template was last updated

id.description: Unique identifier for the template card type

color.description: Color associated with the card type

isDefault.description: Whether this is the default card type

createdAt.description: When the card type was created

updatedAt.description: When the card type was last updated

id.description: Unique identifier for the template list

position.description: Position of the list in the template

updatedAt.description: When the list was last updated

id.description: Unique identifier for the board version

boardId.description: ID of the board this version belongs to

creatorUserId.description: ID of the user who created this version

description.description: Description of what changed in this version
description.example: Completed all user stories for sprint 1

isAutoCreated.description: Whether this version was created automatically

updatedAt.description: When the version was last updated

id.description: Unique identifier for the card

boardId.description: ID of the board the card belongs to (denormalized)

listId.description: ID of the list the card belongs to

creatorUserId.description: ID of the user who created the card

prevListId.description: ID of the previous list the card was in (available when in archive or trash)

coverAttachmentId.description: ID of the attachment used as cover

position.description: Position of the card within the list

isDueCompleted.description: Whether the due date is completed

commentsTotal.description: Total number of comments on the card

syncedFromCardId.description: ID of the card this was imported/synced from

isSyncEnabled.description: Whether sync is enabled for this card (disabled when moved to different list)

listChangedAt.description: When the card was last moved between lists

updatedAt.description: When the card was last updated

id.description: Unique identifier for the card-label association

cardId.description: ID of the card the label is associated with

labelId.description: ID of the label associated with the card

createdAt.description: When the card-label association was created

updatedAt.description: When the card-label association was last updated

id.description: Unique identifier for the card membership

cardId.description: ID of the card the user is a member of

userId.description: ID of the user who is a member of the card

createdAt.description: When the card membership was created

updatedAt.description: When the card membership was last updated

id.description: Unique identifier for the comment

cardId.description: ID of the card the comment belongs to

userId.description: ID of the user who created the comment

updatedAt.description: When the comment was last updated

version.description: Current version of the PLANKA application

activeUsersLimit.description: Maximum number of active users allowed (conditionally added for admins if configured)

oidc.description: OpenID Connect configuration (null if not configured)

authorizationUrl.description: OIDC authorization URL for initiating authentication

endSessionUrl.description: OIDC end session URL for logout (null if not supported by provider)

isEnforced.description: Whether OIDC authentication is enforced (users must use OIDC to login)

id.description: Unique identifier for the custom field

baseCustomFieldGroupId.description: ID of the base custom field group the custom field belongs to

customFieldGroupId.description: ID of the custom field group the custom field belongs to

position.description: Position of the custom field within the group

showOnFrontOfCard.description: Whether to show the field on the front of cards

createdAt.description: When the custom field was created

updatedAt.description: When the custom field was last updated

id.description: Unique identifier for the custom field group

boardId.description: ID of the board the custom field group belongs to

cardId.description: ID of the card the custom field group belongs to

baseCustomFieldGroupId.description: ID of the base custom field group used as a template

position.description: Position of the custom field group within the board/card

name.description: Name/title of the custom field group

createdAt.description: When the custom field group was created

updatedAt.description: When the custom field group was last updated

id.description: Unique identifier for the custom field value

cardId.description: ID of the card the value belongs to

customFieldGroupId.description: ID of the custom field group the value belongs to

customFieldId.description: ID of the custom field the value belongs to

createdAt.description: When the custom field value was created

updatedAt.description: When the custom field value was last updated

id.description: Unique identifier for the label

boardId.description: ID of the board the label belongs to

position.description: Position of the label within the board

updatedAt.description: When the label was last updated

id.description: Unique identifier for the list

boardId.description: ID of the board the list belongs to

position.description: Position of the list within the board

updatedAt.description: When the list was last updated

id.description: Unique identifier for the notification

userId.description: ID of the user who receives the notification

creatorUserId.description: ID of the user who created the notification

boardId.description: ID of the board associated with the notification (denormalized)

cardId.description: ID of the card associated with the notification

commentId.description: ID of the comment associated with the notification

actionId.description: ID of the action associated with the notification

isRead.description: Whether the notification has been read

updatedAt.description: When the notification was last updated

id.description: Unique identifier for the notification service

userId.description: ID of the user the service is associated with

boardId.description: ID of the board the service is associated with

createdAt.description: When the notification service was created

updatedAt.description: When the notification service was last updated

id.description: Unique identifier for the project

ownerProjectManagerId.description: ID of the project manager who owns the project

backgroundImageId.description: ID of the background image used as background

description.example: A project for developing new features...

backgroundType.description: Type of background for the project

updatedAt.description: When the project was last updated

id.description: Unique identifier for the project category

updatedAt.description: When the category was last updated

id.description: Unique identifier for the project manager

projectId.description: ID of the project the manager is associated with

userId.description: ID of the user who is assigned as project manager

createdAt.description: When the project manager was created

updatedAt.description: When the project manager was last updated

id.description: Unique identifier for the project release

projectId.description: ID of the project this release belongs to

description.example: This release includes new features and bug fixes...

releasedAt.description: Actual date when the release was published

updatedAt.description: When the release was last updated

id.description: Unique identifier for the project-team association

updatedAt.description: When the association was last updated

id.description: Unique identifier for the project version

projectId.description: ID of the project this version belongs to

creatorUserId.description: ID of the user who created this version

description.description: Description of what changed in this version
description.example: Major project restructuring with new boards and workflows

snapshotData.description: Complete serialized project state including all boards, lists, and cards

isAutoCreated.description: Whether this version was created automatically

updatedAt.description: When the version was last updated

id.description: Unique identifier for the release-card association

cardId.description: ID of the card (can be epic, story, or task)

updatedAt.description: When the association was last updated

id.description: Unique identifier for the task

taskListId.description: ID of the task list the task belongs to

linkedCardId.description: ID of the card linked to the task

assigneeUserId.description: ID of the user assigned to the task

position.description: Position of the task within the task list

updatedAt.description: When the task was last updated

id.description: Unique identifier for the task list

cardId.description: ID of the card the task list belongs to

position.description: Position of the task list within the card

showOnFrontOfCard.description: Whether to show the task list on the front of the card

createdAt.description: When the task list was created

updatedAt.description: When the task list was last updated

id.description: Unique identifier for the team

creatorUserId.description: ID of the user who created the team

updatedAt.description: When the team was last updated

id.description: Unique identifier for the team membership

userId.description: ID of the user who is a member of the team

updatedAt.description: When the membership was last updated

id.description: Unique identifier for the user

email.description: Email address for login and notifications (private field)

name.description: Full display name of the user

avatar.description: Avatar information for the user with generated URLs

url.description: URL to the full-size avatar image

gravatarUrl.description: Gravatar URL for the user (conditionally added if configured)

permissions.description: List of enabled permissions for the user

language.description: Preferred language for user interface and notifications (personal field)

subscribeToOwnCards.description: Whether the user subscribes to their own cards (personal field)

subscribeToCardWhenCommenting.description: Whether the user subscribes to cards when commenting (personal field)

turnOffRecentCardHighlighting.description: Whether recent card highlighting is disabled (personal field)

enableFavoritesByDefault.description: Whether favorites are enabled by default (personal field)

defaultHomeView.description: Default view mode for the home page (personal field)

defaultProjectsOrder.description: Default sort order for projects display (personal field)

termsType.description: Type of terms applicable to the user based on role

isSsoUser.description: Whether the user is SSO user (private field)

isDeactivated.description: Whether the user account is deactivated and cannot log in

isDefaultAdmin.description: Whether the user is the default admin (visible only to current user or admin)

lockedFieldNames.description: List of fields locked from editing (visible only to current user or admin)

updatedAt.description: When the user was last updated

id.description: Unique identifier for the webhook

events.description: List of events that trigger the webhook

excludedEvents.description: List of events excluded from the webhook

updatedAt.description: When the webhook was last updated

Conflict.description: Request conflicts with current state of the resource

message.example: Access token is missing, invalid or expired

UnprocessableEntity.description: Request contains semantic errors or validation failures

ValidationError.description: Request validation failed due to missing or invalid parameters

problems.description: Array of specific validation error messages
example: "emailOrUsername" is required, but it was not defined.
"password" is required, but it was not defined.

message.example: The server could not fulfill this request (`POST /api/access-tokens`) due to 2 missing or invalid parameters.

post.description: Accept terms during the authentication flow. Converts the pending token to an access token.

pendingToken.description: Pending token received from the authentication flow

signature.description: Terms signature hash based on user role

enum: Admin login required to initialize instance

post.description: Authenticates a user using email/username and password. Returns an access token for API authentication.

emailOrUsername.description: Email address or username of the user

withHttpOnlyToken.description: Whether to include an HTTP-only authentication cookie

enum: Admin login required to initialize instance

delete.description: Logs out the current user by deleting the session and access token. Clears HTTP-only cookies if present.

post.summary: Exchange OIDC code for access token
post.description: Exchanges an OIDC authorization code for an access token. Creates a user if they do not exist.

withHttpOnlyToken.description: Whether to include HTTP-only authentication cookie

enum: Admin login required to initialize instance

message.example: Unable to retrieve required values (email, name)

post.description: Revokes a pending authentication token and cancels the authentication flow.

get.description: Retrieves a list of actions (activity history) for a specific board, with pagination support.

parameters.name: boardId
parameters.description: ID of the board to get actions for

parameters.name: beforeId
parameters.description: ID to get actions before (for pagination)

get.description: Retrieves a list of actions (activity history) for a specific card, with pagination support.

parameters.name: cardId
parameters.description: ID of the card to get actions for

parameters.name: beforeId
parameters.description: ID to get actions before (for pagination)

post.description: Creates an attachment on a card. Requires board editor permissions.

parameters.name: cardId
parameters.description: ID of the card to create the attachment on

delete.description: Deletes an attachment. Requires board editor permissions.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the attachment to delete

patch.description: Updates an attachment. Requires board editor permissions.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the attachment to update

post.description: Uploads a background image for a project. Requires project manager permissions.

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: ID of the project to upload background image for

file.description: Background image file (must be an image format)

delete.description: Deletes a background image. Requires project manager permissions.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the background image to delete

post.description: Creates a base custom field group within a project. Requires project manager permissions.

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: ID of the project to create the base custom field group in

name.description: Name/title of the base custom field group

200.description: Base custom field group created successfully

delete.description: Deletes a base custom field group. Requires project manager permissions.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the base custom field group to delete

200.description: Base custom field group deleted successfully

patch.description: Updates a base custom field group. Requires project manager permissions.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the base custom field group to update

name.description: Name/title of the base custom field group

200.description: Base custom field group updated successfully

delete.description: Unlink boards (stops synchronization, but keeps both boards)

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Board link ID

patch.description: Update sync settings for a board link

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Board link ID

get.description: Get all linked boards for a board

parameters.name: boardId
parameters.description: Board ID

post.description: Creates a board membership within a board. Requires project manager permissions.

parameters.name: boardId
parameters.description: ID of the board to create the board membership in

userId.description: ID of the user who is a member of the board

role.description: Role of the user in the board

canComment.description: Whether the user can comment on cards (applies only to viewers)

delete.description: Deletes a board membership. Users can remove their own membership, project managers can remove any membership.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the board membership to delete

patch.description: Updates a board membership. Requires project manager permissions.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the board membership to update

role.description: Role of the user in the board

canComment.description: Whether the user can comment on cards (applies only to viewers)

post.description: Creates a new release for the specified board.

parameters.name: boardId
parameters.description: The ID of the board

reviewResult.example: All tests passed, ready for production

get.summary: Get all releases for a board
get.description: Retrieves all releases for a specific board that the current user has access to.

parameters.name: boardId
parameters.description: The ID of the board

delete.description: Deletes an existing release. Only non-released releases can be deleted.

parameters.name: boardId
parameters.description: The ID of the board

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the release

put.description: Updates an existing release for the specified board.

parameters.name: boardId
parameters.description: The ID of the board

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the release

get.description: Retrieves the board snapshot for a released release, showing the state of cards at the time of release.

parameters.name: boardId
parameters.description: The ID of the board

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the release

snapshot.description: The snapshot data containing board state

patch.description: Updates the status of a release (e.g., planning to in_progress to released).

parameters.name: boardId
parameters.description: The ID of the board

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the release

post.description: Adds a team to a board. Requires project manager permissions.

parameters.name: boardId
parameters.description: ID of the board

teamId.description: ID of the team to add

role.description: Role of the team in the board

canComment.description: Whether the team can comment on cards (applies only to viewers)

get.description: Returns all teams associated with a board.

parameters.name: boardId
parameters.description: ID of the board

delete.description: Removes a team from a board. Requires project manager permissions.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the board team

patch.description: Updates a board team role. Requires project manager permissions.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the board team

role.description: Role of the team in the board

canComment.description: Whether the team can comment on cards (applies only to viewers)

post.summary: Add card type to board template
post.description: Adds a card type to a board template. Requires admin permissions.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the board template

isDefault.description: Whether this is the default card type

post.description: Adds a list to a board template. Requires admin permissions.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the board template

position.description: Position of the list

post.description: Creates a new board template. Requires admin permissions.

isListsLocked.description: Whether lists are locked for users

get.description: Retrieves all board templates. Requires admin permissions.

delete.description: Deletes a card type from a board template. Requires admin permissions.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the board template

parameters.name: typeId
parameters.description: ID of the card type

delete.description: Deletes a list from a board template. Requires admin permissions.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the board template

parameters.name: listId
parameters.description: ID of the list

patch.description: Updates a list in a board template. Requires admin permissions.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the board template

parameters.name: listId
parameters.description: ID of the list

position.description: Position of the list

delete.description: Deletes a board template. Requires admin permissions.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the board template

get.description: Retrieves a single board template with its lists and card types. Requires admin permissions.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the board template

patch.description: Updates a board template. Requires admin permissions.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the board template

isListsLocked.description: Whether lists are locked for users

post.description: Creates a snapshot version of the current board state. Requires board member permissions.

parameters.name: boardId
parameters.description: ID of the board to create a version for

get.description: Retrieves all versions for a specific board. Requires board member permissions.

parameters.name: boardId
parameters.description: ID of the board to list versions for

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of versions to return

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Number of versions to skip

delete.description: Deletes a specific board version. Requires board member permissions.

parameters.name: boardId
parameters.description: ID of the board

parameters.name: versionId
parameters.description: ID of the version to delete

post.description: Restores a board to a previous version state. Requires board member permissions.

parameters.name: boardId
parameters.description: ID of the board to restore

parameters.name: versionId
parameters.description: ID of the version to restore to

post.description: Creates a board within a project. Supports importing from Trello. Requires project manager permissions.

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: ID of the project to create the board in

position.description: Position of the board within the project

delete.description: Deletes a board and all its contents (lists, cards, etc.). Requires project manager permissions.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the board to delete

get.description: Retrieves comprehensive board information, including lists, cards, and other related data.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the board to retrieve

parameters.name: subscribe
parameters.description: Whether to subscribe to real-time updates for this board (only for socket connections)

isSubscribed.description: Whether the current user is subscribed to the board
Whether the current user is subscribed to the card

patch.description: Updates a board. Project managers can update all fields, board members can only subscribe/unsubscribe.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the board to update

position.description: Position of the board within the project

defaultCardType.description: Default card type for new cards

limitCardTypesToDefaultOne.description: Whether to limit card types to default one

alwaysDisplayCardCreator.description: Whether to always display card creators

expandTaskListsByDefault.description: Whether to expand task lists by default

isSubscribed.description: Whether the current user is subscribed to the board

post.description: Duplicates a board, either as a new board or into an existing project without losing data.

parameters.name: boardId
parameters.description: ID of the source board

mode.description: Duplicate as new board or into an existing project

name.description: Optional new board name (defaults to source name + " (Copy)")

get.description: Search boards by name with permission-based access control

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Search query string (searches in board name)

parameters.name: projectIds
parameters.description: Comma-separated project IDs to filter by

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination (1-based)

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Number of items per page

patch.description: Transfers a board from one project to another. Requires admin or project manager permissions for both source and target projects.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the board to transfer

position.description: Position in the target project (optional)

post.description: Creates a dependency between two cards. The card becomes dependent on another card. Requires board editor permissions.

parameters.name: cardId
parameters.description: ID of the card that will depend on another card

dependsOnCardId.description: ID of the card that this card depends on

delete.description: Removes a dependency relationship between two cards. Requires board editor permissions.

parameters.name: cardId
parameters.description: ID of the card to remove the dependency from

parameters.name: dependsOnCardId
parameters.description: ID of the card that was depended on

post.description: Adds a label to a card. Requires board editor permissions.

parameters.name: cardId
parameters.description: ID of the card to add the label to

labelId.description: ID of the label to add to the card

delete.description: Removes a label from a card. Requires board editor permissions.

parameters.name: cardId
parameters.description: ID of the card to remove the label from

parameters.name: labelId
parameters.description: ID of the label to remove from the card

post.description: Adds a user to a card. Requires board editor permissions.

parameters.name: cardId
parameters.description: ID of the card to add the user to

userId.description: ID of the card to add the user to

delete.description: Removes a user from a card. Requires board editor permissions.

parameters.name: cardId
parameters.description: ID of the card to remove the user from

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: ID of the user to remove from the card

post.description: Creates a card within a list. Requires board editor permissions.

parameters.name: listId
parameters.description: ID of the list to create the card in

parentCardId.description: ID of the parent card (must be a STORY card)

position.description: Position of the card within the list

isDueCompleted.description: Whether the due date is completed

get.description: Retrieves cards from an endless list with filtering, search, and pagination support.

parameters.name: listId
parameters.description: ID of the list to get cards from (must be an endless list)

parameters.name: before
parameters.description: Pagination cursor (JSON object with id and listChangedAt)

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search term to filter cards

parameters.name: filterUserIds
parameters.description: Comma-separated user IDs to filter by members

parameters.name: filterLabelIds
parameters.description: Comma-separated label IDs to filter by labels

isSubscribed.description: Whether the current user is subscribed to the card

delete.description: Deletes a card and all its contents (tasks, attachments, etc.). Requires board editor permissions.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the card to delete

get.description: Retrieves comprehensive card information, including tasks, attachments, and other related data.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the card to retrieve

isSubscribed.description: Whether the current user is subscribed to the card

cards.description: Dependency cards (cards that this card depends on or that depend on this card)

patch.description: Updates a card. Board editors can update all fields, viewers can only subscribe/unsubscribe.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the card to update

boardId.description: ID of the board to move the card to

listId.description: ID of the list to move the card to

coverAttachmentId.description: ID of the attachment used as cover

position.description: Position of the card within the list

isDueCompleted.description: Whether the due date is completed

isSubscribed.description: Whether the current user is subscribed to the card

post.description: Creates a duplicate of a card with all its contents (tasks, attachments, etc.). Requires board editor permissions.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the card to duplicate

position.description: Position for the duplicated card within the list

get.description: Retrieves cards matching filter criteria with permission-based access control

parameters.name: projectIds
parameters.description: Comma-separated project IDs to filter by

parameters.name: userIds
parameters.description: Comma-separated user IDs to filter by card members

parameters.name: labelIds
parameters.description: Comma-separated label IDs to filter by

parameters.name: cardType
parameters.description: Card type to filter (project, story, epic, other)

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter by card status

parameters.name: createdByUserId
parameters.description: Filter cards created by a specific user

parameters.name: assignedToUserId
parameters.description: Filter cards assigned to a specific user

parameters.name: startDateFrom
parameters.description: Filter cards with start date >= this value

parameters.name: startDateTo
parameters.description: Filter cards with start date <= this value

parameters.name: dueDateFrom
parameters.description: Filter cards with due date >= this value

parameters.name: dueDateTo
parameters.description: Filter cards with due date <= this value

parameters.name: weightFrom
parameters.description: Filter cards with weight >= this value

parameters.name: weightTo
parameters.description: Filter cards with weight <= this value

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Field to sort by

parameters.name: sortOrder
parameters.description: Sort order

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination (1-based)

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Number of items per page

get.description: Retrieves all child cards for a given parent card (story card). Requires board access permissions.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the parent card (must be a story card)

post.description: Imports a card from another board/project with sync enabled. The imported card will sync all properties (dates, labels, members, description, etc.) with the source card bidirectionally. Sync stops when either card moves to a different list. Only admins and project managers can import cards.

sourceCardId.description: ID of the source card to import from

targetListId.description: ID of the target list to import into

position.description: Position for the imported card within the target list

name.description: Optional custom name for the imported card (defaults to source card name)

200.description: Card imported and sync enabled successfully

post.description: Marks all notifications for a specific card as read for the current user. Requires access to the card.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the card to mark notifications as read for

patch.description: Updates the release assignment for a card.

parameters.name: cardId
parameters.description: The ID of the card
